what: What the Package Does (One Line, Title Case)
title: What the Package Does (One Line, Title Case)
text: Welcome BobRoss R package! package provides data Bob Ross’s Joy Painting includes Shiny app analyze colors used famous paintings. Dive vibrant world Bob Ross explore used different colors across paintings.

title: What the Package Does (One Line, Title Case)
text: BobRoss package contains: - dataset captures color information Bob Ross’s paintings featured Joy Painting series. - Shiny app allows visualize interactively explore colors used paintings.

title: What the Package Does (One Line, Title Case)
text: install BobRoss package, can use following command install directly GitHub:
code: # Install devtools package if you don't have it install.packages("devtools")  # Install BobRoss package from GitHub devtools::install_github("ETC5523-2024/assignment-4-packages-and-shiny-apps-Raodityaaa/BobRoss")

title: BobRoss: Analyze Bob Ross's Paintings with a Shiny App — BobRoss
text: loadbob: Launches Shiny app exploring Bob Ross's painting colors. bob_ross: Accesses dataset containing information paintings colors.

title: BobRoss: Analyze Bob Ross's Paintings with a Shiny App — BobRoss
text: dataset includes information 400 paintings, covering variables : img_src: URL image painting. painting_title: Title painting. season: Season number. episode: Episode number within season. num_colors: Number colors used painting. youtube_src: URL YouTube video episode. colors: List colors used painting. color_hex: Hexadecimal values colors used.

title: Bob Ross Painting Dataset — bob_ross
text: dataset contains detailed information paintings Bob Ross's television show Joy Painting. row corresponds one painting includes metadata season, episode, number colors used, links painting images YouTube videos.

title: Bob Ross Painting Dataset — bob_ross
text: data frame 403 rows 26 variables: img_src Character. URL link image painting. painting_title Character. title painting. season Numeric. season number painting created. episode Numeric. episode number within season. num_colors Numeric. total number colors used painting. youtube_src Character. URL link YouTube video episode painting made. colors Character. List colors used painting. color_hex Character. List hexadecimal values colors used painting. Black_Gesso Logical. Whether color "Black Gesso" used painting. Bright_Red Logical. Whether color "Bright Red" used painting. Burnt_Umber Logical. Whether color "Burnt Umber" used painting. Cadmium_Yellow Logical. Whether color "Cadmium Yellow" used painting. Dark_Sienna Logical. Whether color "Dark Sienna" used painting. Indian_Red Logical. Whether color "Indian Red" used painting. Indian_Yellow Logical. Whether color "Indian Yellow" used painting. Liquid_Black Logical. Whether color "Liquid Black" used painting. Liquid_Clear Logical. Whether color "Liquid Clear" used painting. Midnight_Black Logical. Whether color "Midnight Black" used painting. Phthalo_Blue Logical. Whether color "Phthalo Blue" used painting. Phthalo_Green Logical. Whether color "Phthalo Green" used painting. Prussian_Blue Logical. Whether color "Prussian Blue" used painting. Sap_Green Logical. Whether color "Sap Green" used painting. Titanium_White Logical. Whether color "Titanium White" used painting. Van_Dyke_Brown Logical. Whether color "Van Dyke Brown" used painting. Yellow_Ochre Logical. Whether color "Yellow Ochre" used painting. Alizarin_Crimson Logical. Whether color "Alizarin Crimson" used painting.

title: Bob Ross Painting Dataset — bob_ross
text: Data collected Bob Ross's Joy Painting, extracted https://www.twoinchbrush.com/ https://www.youtube.com/.
